programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson must disclose the secrets of her past to help a rape victim recall the details of one terrible, traumatic night.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a case involving two students in a special needs school; Rollins discovers that one child's medical issues stem from a surprising source.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint; Benson makes an attempt to defuse the situation; the team discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncover a dangerous criminal network prepared to silence anyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a masked pizza deliveryman assaults a seemingly random couple in their home, SVU must unravel a complicated revenge plot before anyone else is victimized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an underage runaway is found beaten and raped, the SVU team works with federal prosecutor Connie Rubirosa (Alana De La Garza); ADA Barba suspects a cover-up when he fails to get the help he needs from Jersey law enforcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro suspects the boyfriend of a missing girl is involved with a gang; Sgt. Benson becomes the SVU's new commanding officer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a controversial misogynistic comic is accused of rape, Benson is happy to arrest him, but Barba feels the case is weak.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins is contacted by a hometown friend when his nephew, a high school football star, goes missing in New York; Rollins seeks help with her escalating problems.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey returns to work after a brush with death; Shay's new partner is friendly to everyone but her; Dawson begins training; Severide prepares for his instructor duties; Clarke refuses to talk to the police about the murder.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey tries to convince everyone he is healthy; Shay avoids the lawyer who wants to talk about Daryl's suicide; Otis and Katie grow closer; Boden helps a woman with a negligent landlord.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A call to the field may throw a wrench in Dawson's plan to retake the firefighter exam; the firehouse welcomes a new addition; Boden makes a bold move.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey deals with the fallout from his sister's divorce; Dawson and Mills settle into their new roles at the station; Brett can't decide what she wants to do; the Molly's crew struggles to get the food truck started.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey helps his sister and faces down his corrupt brother-in-law; Brett goes out of her way to assist a mother in need; Mills learns about unlicensed private investigation; Dawson starts training with Herrmann.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey discovers a new crack house on the block that's harboring a female junkie; a new trainee gets Dawson and Brett into trouble; Severide gets an unexpected visit from his father.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey reunites with a former colleague; Dawson and Brett serve their time in retraining; Severide tries to fix what's going on with Anna.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Reeling from Dawson's continued absence, Casey makes a rash move during a rescue, while Brett struggles with a series of replacement partners; meanwhile, Boden faces scrutiny from Commissioner Grissom, who sends his deputy to monitor Firehouse 51.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mouch, Gallo, Ritter and Mackey report for training; a nasty blow to the head brings Casey unimaginable pain.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of suspicious fires sends 51 on a search for the cause; Casey continues down a troubling path; Mouch is looking to make his long-awaited dream come true.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A new recruit with ties to the CFD tests Serveride's patience; Violet receives a mysterious note that sends her and Brett on a hunt for the person who wrote it.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden, Kidd and Severide work together to protect one of their own; at the Fire Academy, Herrmann meets an inspiring young man; talk of the annual CFD Gala dominates the firehouse.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Seager team up to investigate a fire at the home of a troubled young woman; Pelham moves into 51's rumored cursed office; Kylie assists Kidd with Girls on Fire.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: After witnessing a domestic dispute, Brett and Violet decide to take the investigation into their own hands; Mouch vets Truck 81's new firefighter; Herrmann relies on something new to aid him on the job.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Storm-chasers (Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton) finalizing their divorce try to place equipment inside a tornado on the Oklahoma plains.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins strikes a deal with the managers of a gambling club in order to protect her job, she ends up drawing the suspicion of Benson and Tutuola.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson is assigned a 24/7 security detail when William Lewis (Pablo Schreiber) escapes from prison and starts killing again; Benson must decide how much she is willing to sacrifice to save a child's life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Sgt. Olivia Benson is investigated by Internal Affairs after William Lewis' death; as pressure mounts, Olivia has to choose between her convictions and her badge.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager disappears after schoolmates make her the subject of a vicious cyberbullying attack.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two women are murdered in the same town and police fear a serial killer is on the loose, further investigation finds that they were both close to the same man.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We take a look back at this thrilling encounter between Manchester United and Liverpool at Old Trafford. Mark Hughes scored twice late on to earn the hosts a share of the spoils.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this seven-goal thriller between Chelsea and Tottenham at Stamford Bridge. Mark Stein scored a last-gasp penalty to snatch all three points for Glenn Hoddle's side.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We take a look back at this clash between the two Manchester rivals. City raced into a two-goal lead but it was the visitors who took the points after Eric Cantona's late winner.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this classic 1994/95 clash between Tottenham Hotspur and Newcastle United at White Hart Lane. The match featured a stunning hat-trick from an England international.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Take a look back at one of the Premier League's classic derby matches between Everton and Liverpool. The points looked to be shared before Gary McAllister stepped up late on.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit West Ham's trip to Stamford Bridge to face Chelsea in the 2002/03 Premier League season. Paulo Di Canio's brace earned the visitors their first win of the season.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Tottenham and Leicester. The visitors thought they had snatched the win until Jermain Defoe's late leveller.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Revisit Aston Villa and Chelsea's five-goal classic from the 2003/4 Premier League. Villa were pushing for a UEFA Cup spot while Chelsea hoped to keep pace with leaders Arsenal.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the six-goal 2007/08 Premier League epic between Fulham and Tottenham at Craven Cottage. With pressure mounting on manager Martin Jol, Spurs desperately needed a win.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Take a look back at this classic Premier League clash between Manchester United and Liverpool. Dimitar Berbatov stole the show with a hat-trick for Sir Alex Ferguson's side.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We take a look back at this epic Premier League clash from the 2012/13 season as Arsenal and Fulham play out a six-goal thriller at the Emirates Stadium.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Take a look back at this pulsating seven-goal thriller between Manchester United and Newcastle. Javier Hernandez was the hero as his stoppage time goal sealed victory for United.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013/14 Premier League classic between Everton and Liverpool at Goodison Park. This pulsating Merseyside derby is regarded as one of the finest in living memory.
